<<<<<<< HEAD
A light vnto the vnlearned: or, The principles of the doctrine of Christ Set downe most briefely, for the use of yong and ignorant persons. To be learned and remembred, at all times: but specially, when they would come to the holy communion. Divided into eight sections. Inman, Francis, d. 1638.
[4], 10 p.
Printed by Iohn Legat for George Lathum, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Brasen Serpent, London : 1622.
Preface signed: Fran: Inman. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[4], 10 p.
Printed by Iohn Legat for George Lathum, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Brasen Serpent, London : 1622.
